com.dors.util

Class IdleShutdownManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dors.util.IdleShutdownManager

  • public class IdleShutdownManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the idle period of the API, when not in use DORS should shutdown completely to maximize CPU availability elsewhere, and once a new task has been received it may be started once again
    Author:
    Faris
